section.title: Removing a CPU Profile
section.para: Remove an existing CPU profile from your Red Hat Virtualization environment.

step.para: Click the Clusters resource tab and select a cluster.
Click the CPU Profiles sub tab in the details pane.
Select the CPU profile to remove.

section.para: You have removed a CPU profile, and that CPU profile is no longer available. If the CPU profile was assigned to any virtual machines, those virtual machines are automatically assigned the default CPU profile.
